text: Mimestola imitatrix is a species of beetle in the family Cerambycidae, and the only species in the genus Mimestola. It was described by Breuning in 1940.Biolib.cz - Mimestola imitatrix. Retrieved on 8 September 2014. ==References== Category:Desmiphorini Category:Beetles described in 1940 Category:Monotypic beetle genera
title: Mimestola
